statements: SELECT * FROM recipe_views WHERE recipe_id = 1
SELECT recipe_id, views_count FROM recipe_views
SELECT views_count, recipe_id FROM recipe_views WHERE views_count > 100
SELECT recipe_id, views_count FROM recipe_views WHERE recipe_id = 2
SELECT views_count FROM recipe_views
SELECT * FROM recipe_views WHERE views_count > 100 ORDER BY recipe_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT recipe_id, SUM(views_count) AS total_views FROM recipe_views GROUP BY recipe_id ORDER BY total_views DESC
SELECT recipe_id, views_count FROM recipe_views WHERE recipe_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY views_count DESC
SELECT recipe_id, views_count FROM recipe_views WHERE views_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY views_count DESC
SELECT AVG(views_count) AS avg_views FROM recipe_views
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name FROM recipes ORDER BY views_count DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, views_count FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE 'Chicken%';
SELECT * FROM views WHERE view_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY view_date DESC;
SELECT r.recipe_name, v.view_date FROM recipes r INNER JOIN views v ON r.recipe_id = v.recipe_id;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE views_count > 100 ORDER BY recipe_name ASC
SELECT recipe_name, views_count FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY views_count DESC
SELECT * FROM views WHERE view_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31' ORDER BY view_date DESC
SELECT recipe_name, views_count FROM recipes JOIN views ON recipes.recipe_id = views.recipe_id WHERE view_date >= '2021-05-01' ORDER BY views_count ASC
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE views_count = (SELECT MAX(views_count) FROM recipes) ORDER BY recipe_id ASC
SELECT * FROM recipe_views;
SELECT recipe_id, views_count FROM recipe_views ORDER BY views_count DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_id, popularity_rank FROM popular_recipes WHERE popularity_rank > 5;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE 'Chicken%' ORDER BY recipe_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 5;
SELECT recipe_name, popularity_rank FROM popular_recipes WHERE popularity_rank > 10;
SELECT ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE 'Pasta%';
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%cheese%';
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, views_count FROM recipes ORDER BY views_count DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM recipes r JOIN recipe_ingredients ri ON r.recipe_id = ri.recipe_id JOIN ingredients i ON ri.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id;
SELECT r.recipe_name, COUNT(rv.view_id) AS total_views FROM recipes r LEFT JOIN recipe_views rv ON r.recipe_id = rv.recipe_id GROUP BY r.recipe_name;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_name LIKE '%chicken%';
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, views_count FROM recipes ORDER BY views_count DESC;

SELECT recipes.recipe_name, ingredients.ingredient_name FROM recipes JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_id JOIN ingredients ON ingredients.ingredient_id = recipe_ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE views_count > 1000;
SELECT recipe_id, COUNT(*) AS ingredient_count FROM recipe_ingredients GROUP BY recipe_id HAVING ingredient_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE views_count > 1000;
SELECT recipe_name, views_count FROM recipes ORDER BY views_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_name LIKE '%%salt%%';

SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM recipes JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_id JOIN ingredients ON ingredients.ingredient_id = recipe_ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT recipe_name, views_count FROM recipes WHERE views_count > 100 ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_name LIKE 'Chicken%' ORDER BY ingredient_id;
SELECT user_name FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT ri.recipe_id, i.ingredient_name, ri.quantity FROM recipe_ingredients ri JOIN ingredients i ON ri.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id WHERE ri.quantity >= 2 ORDER BY ri.recipe_id, i.ingredient_name;
SELECT rv.view_id, r.recipe_name, rv.view_timestamp FROM recipe_views rv JOIN recipes r ON rv.recipe_id = r.recipe_id ORDER BY rv.view_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
